mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_NO, UPRN_SEQ_NO, FLNM, URL, LVL, ODR, UZ_YN FROM HMFB_002 ORDER BY CAST(ODR as SIGNED INTEGER) ASC

WITH AUTH_MENU AS ( SELECT MENU_SEQ_NO, AUTH_DVCD FROM HMFB_001 WHERE AUTH_DVCD = #{authDvcd} ) SELECT AM.AUTH_DVCD, H2.SEQ_NO, H2.UPRN_SEQ_NO, H2.FLNM, H2.URL, H2.LVL, H2.ODR, H2.UZ_YN FROM HMFB_002 H2 LEFT OUTER JOIN AUTH_MENU AM ON H2.SEQ_NO = AM.MENU_SEQ_NO WHERE H2.UZ_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CAST(H2.ODR as SIGNED INTEGER) ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HMFB_002 ( SEQ_NO, UPRN_SEQ_NO, FLNM, URL, LVL, ODR, UZ_YN, REG_DT, REG_TM ) VALUES( #{seqNo}, #{uprnSeqNo}, #{flnm}, #{url}, #{lvl}, #{odr}, #{uzYn}, #{regDt}, #{regTm} )
INSERT INTO HMFB_001 ( MENU_SEQ_NO, AUTH_DVCD, REG_DT, REG_TM ) VALUES( #{menuSeqNo}, #{authDvcd}, #{regDt}, #{regTm} )
